thread.title: Tottenham fans troll Arsenal with brilliant Arsene Wenger song | Metro News
thread.title_full: Tottenham fans troll Arsenal with brilliant Arsene Wenger song | Metro News

author: Evan Bartlett For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Tottenham fans troll Arsenal with brilliant Arsene Wenger song | Metro News
text:
Evan Bartlett for Metro.co.uk Sunday 19 Feb 2017 3:24 pm Wenger’s week could only get worse if Arsenal lose to Sutton United on Monday (Getty Images) 
It’s been a tough week for Arsene Wenger . 
On Wednesday night he watched his Arsenal side collapse in Munich and he’s faced intense speculation about his future at the club in the days since. 
But perhaps the lowest moment came during Tottenham’s match against Fulham at Craven Cottage on Sunday. 
With their side taking the lead early on, Spurs fans took the chance to start taunting their north London rivals with a song. 
‘We want you to stay. We want you to stay. Arsene Wenger, we want you to stay!’ Spurs took an early lead against Fulham on Sunday (Getty)
